scripts.build:css: node-sass --include-path ./node_modules --output-style compressed ./src/scss/application.scss ./dist/css/application.css && postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' ./dist/css/application.css -r true
scripts.build:js: babel src/js/application.js | terser --compress --mangle > dist/js/bundle.js && browserify dist/js/bundle.js -o dist/js/bundle.js
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:html && npm run build:favicon
scripts.watch: parallelshell "npm run watch:css -s" "npm run watch:js -s" "npm run watch:html -s"
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run build:favicon && parallelshell "npm run watch" "npm run serve" "npm run open:dev -s"
